name: Blue Peteâ€™s Sweet Potato Biscuits
instructions: While mashed potatoes are still hot, measure 1 1/2 cups in bowl.
Sift together flour, baking powder and cinnamon and add to potato mix.
Work with hands to make a soft dough.
Chill dough, roll out and cut into biscuits.
Bake on greased cookie sheet on top shelf of 400 oven for 15-20 minutes until light golden brown.
